title: Most Recent It Will Never Work in Theory

elements.title: 2021-10-21: The Impact of Sleep Deprivation
elements.contents: Last month we wrote that we wouldn't review any more papers on test-driven development, but Fucci2020 isn't really about TDD. Instead, the authors measured how well students wrote tests in order to gauge the effects of going a night without sleep. By comparing those who slept with those who didn't, they found that a single sleepless night reduced code quality by 50%.
